There are 50 jobs at British Ceramic Tile due to demand for 'Buy British' By HannahFinch   0 COMMENTS SHARES BCT make tiles with clay and sand from Devon There are 50 jobs at British Ceramic Tile due to demand for 'Buy British' X

Around 50 jobs have been created at Devon manufacturer British Ceramic Tiles. 
The Heathfield-based firm is on a major recruitment drive and is looking for workers in manufacturing, sales, customer service, design, quality laboratory and engineering departments. 
Tony Taylor, Chief Executive, said: "We are looking to recruit colleagues with experience of working in a busy manufacturing environment who we will then train for the skills needed for the ceramic tile industry – 'hire for attitude, train for skills'." Who is coming to see us on Wednesday night? Open evening, Heathfield, 20+ jobs available, 5pm-7pm! @JCPinDevon @JCPinTorquay @JCPinExeter pic.twitter.com/9N9ddFKQZv — BCT Careers (@BCTcareerUK) June 19, 2017 
It is holding an open evening at its Heathfield headquarters on Wednesday June 21, 5pm - 7pm. 
British Ceramic Tile is the UK's largest tile producer and over the last three years, has experienced huge UK and overseas demand for its Devon manufactured "HD" – (High Definition) ceramic tiles using local clay and sand. 
Mr Taylor said: "We are adding significant production capacity, and so need experienced people to join us as we grow. 
"Given the high levels of employment in Devon, finding good people is always a challenge." 
British Ceramic Tile is one of the largest employers in Devon with around 400 staff at its manufacturing site at Heathfield, distribution at Cullompton, and commercial offices in West Yorkshire, and Clerkenwell, London. 
Demand for Devon made tiles - "Designed in Britain, Made in Britain" is high and BCT exports about 10% of its output to countries including Scandinavia, Central Europe, the Middle East and North America. 
Mr Taylor said Brexit will provide challenges but good business values will continue. 
He said: "No doubt the UK's exit from Europe will provide challenges along the way but the fundamental principles of providing our customers with great design and service at great prices, driven by the team of people at BCT will not change. 
"I am sure this will help us continue to prosper during the period of transition." NEWS
